name: Philip Morris International Inc.
description: Philip Morris International Inc. (PMI) is a leading international tobacco company, known for its commitment to developing a smoke-free future. Founded in 1847, PMI has evolved from a traditional tobacco manufacturer to a company focused on providing innovative alternatives to combustible cigarettes. The company markets a range of brands, including the well-known Marlboro, alongside its reduced-risk products such as IQOS, a heated tobacco system designed to offer a less harmful alternative to smoking. PMI's mission is to deliver a smoke-free future by investing in science and technology to create products that are better for adult smokers and society as a whole. With a robust global presence, PMI operates in over 180 markets worldwide, and its products are sold in more than 70 countries. The company is dedicated to sustainability, working towards reducing its environmental impact and ensuring responsible sourcing of its tobacco. PMI's research and development efforts are geared towards transitioning adult smokers to smoke-free products, reflecting its commitment to public health and consumer choice. As the industry undergoes significant changes, PMI is positioned at the forefront of the tobacco market's evolution, aiming to lead the way in innovative tobacco harm reduction strategies.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
